name: TabPanel
description: TabView element consists of one or more TabPanel elements.

header-style.label: headerStyle
header-style.title: Inline style of the tab header.

header-class.label: headerClass
header-class.title: Style class of the tab header.

header-props.label: headerProps
header-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLLiElement to the tab header.

header-action-props.label: headerActionProps
header-action-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLAnchorElement to the focusable anchor element inside the tab header.

content-style.label: contentStyle
content-style.title: Inline style of the tab content.

content-class.label: contentClass
content-class.title: Style class of the tab content.

content-props.label: contentProps
content-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLDivElement to the tab content.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

events.name: tab-change
events.title: Callback to invoke when an active tab is changed.

events.name: tab-click
events.title: Callback to invoke when an active tab is clicked.
